translations.chinese: 漢王拜越為魏相國，令定梁地。
translations.english: King Han appointed Yue as prime minister of Wei and ordered him to pacify Liang territory.

translations.chinese: 漢王遂入彭城，收羽美人貨賂，置酒高會。
translations.english: King Han then entered Pengcheng, took Xiang Yu's beautiful women and treasures, and held a great banquet.

translations.chinese: 羽聞之，令其將擊齊，而自以精兵三 萬人從魯出胡陵，至蕭，晨擊漢軍，大戰彭城靈壁東睢水上，大破漢軍，多殺士卒，睢水為之不流。
translations.english: Xiang Yu heard of this and ordered his generals to attack Qi, while he himself led 30,000 elite troops from Lu through Huling to Xiao. At dawn he attacked the Han army, fighting a great battle east of Pengcheng at Lingbi on the Sui River. He greatly defeated the Han army, killing many soldiers and officers. The Sui River stopped flowing because of the bodies.
He surrounded King Han three times.

translations.chinese: 大風從西北起，折木發屋，揚砂石，晝晦，楚軍大 亂，而漢王得與數十騎遁去。
translations.english: A great wind arose from the northwest, breaking trees and tearing off roofs, whipping up sand and stones, darkening the day. The Chu army was greatly thrown into confusion, and King Han was able to escape with several dozen cavalry.
